attributes.action: Do away with the children's registry, as we feel it will endanger our children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/news/politics/article2332307.ece

The amount of children that will be in harm's way will enormously outway the amount of children that it will help.  Over 300,000 people having access to home addresses and personal information of children assures that a decent amount of pedophiles will have a field day. We have a hard enough time keeping our babes safe from harm on a daly basis.  As others have pointed out, if it is so safe and secure, why are children of politicians and the elite/famous being ex-directory? Because it isn't secure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
